quoteLast: ," he tried to do it by gestures and facial expression. This is a difficult feat, particularly as most young players run a little fast or a little slow and are rather in need of regulating. When the young man left the theater at the close of the performance we sought him out and reproached him bitterly on the ground of his bad acting.
title: Pieces of Hate; And Other Enthusiasms
author: Broun, Heywood, 1888-1939

quoteFirst: The island-continent of Australia lies south of Asia, between the Indian and Pacific oceans, and it extends from 10 degrees
quoteLast: 9 degrees 8 minutes south latitude and from 113 degrees to 153 degrees 30 minutes east longitude. Its area is 2,974,581 square miles and the population, not including aborigines, is 4,455,005, mainly of British origin.
title: Something about sugar
author: Rolph, George M. (George Morrison), 1873-1932
